name: Hospital Visit (tiffanytran)
description:
In "Hospital Visit," the player navigates the adjustment process to long-term care at a pediatric hospital in this 2D drag-and-drop hidden object game. The purpose of this game is to help children feel more comfortable during their adaptation to a new hospital environment and improve their overall experience. The goal is to help decrease the anxiety children may face regarding hospitals through education on common medical objects, machines, and procedures.

Instructions: Drag and drop the objects to their correct locations! In levels 2 and 3, more information on each object is available if you hover over the item's names.

Check out more on "Hospital Visit" here. [insert link later]
